snippet: Recently reviewed books of particular interest.
lead_paragraph: THE NEWLYWEDS, by Nell Freudenberger. (Knopf, $25.95.) The story of a Bangladeshi woman, her new American husband and their previous romantic entanglements is told with empathy, an effective writing style and an international sensibility. ARE YOU MY MOTHER?: A Comic Drama, by Alison Bechdel. (Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, $22.) Bechdel's engaging, original graphic novel explores her troubled relationship with her distant mother.

headline.main: Editors' Choice | Recent Books Of Particular Interest
